pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Fast Implementation of Distance Covariance // Efficient methods for computing distance covariance and relevant statistics. See Szkely et al.(2007) doi:10.1214/009053607000000505; Szkely and Rizzo (2013) doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2013.02.012; Szkely and Rizzo (2014) doi:10.1214/14-AOS1255; Huo and Szkely (2016) doi:10.1080/00401706.2015.1054435.
